entry.title: Welcome to My Blog!
entry.content:
Hey Guys! Thanks for checking out my blog.

I donâ€™t have much here yet but I soon hope to start posting some of my setup and code soon to use Munki, PuppetServer, Simain, Sal, MunkiReport, Crypt, MacNamer, and Imagr to set up a full fledged automated mac management configuration and reporting solution.
